document_data.name: ''Boots of star striding''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Boots of star striding ''''' were a type of [[magic]]al pair of boots that allowed its wearer to walk across [[gravity plane]]s, outside of [[spelljammer|spelljamming ships]] in [[wildspace]].{{Cite dragon/159/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Magic from the stars}}
document_data.Powers:
In addition to allowing travel across gravity planes, albeit at half speed, these boots continually oriented their wearer to, and between, these planes. The wearer could leap between, fall, or otherwise maneuver between the planes, or the surface of spelljammers, with no oscillation.

Like most magical footwear, ''boots of star striding'' shrunk or grew to snugly fit the feet of their wearer.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Gamalon Idogyr]], the famed [[wizard]] from [[Tethyr]], owned a pair of ''boots of star striding''.
